document.title: The Heisenberg group and Hermite functions

para.p:
For
∈
( z , t )
,
( w , s )
×
C n
R
, define the operation

Math.text: open-interval@(z, t) * open-interval@(w, s) = open-interval@(z + w, t + s + (1 / 2) * Im * (z cdot overline@(w)))

para.p: which satisfies

Math.text: open-interval@(z, t) * open-interval@(0, 0) = open-interval@(z, t)

para.p:
and because
=
⁢ Im
(
⋅ z
¯ z
)
0
,

Math.text: (open-interval@(z, t)) ^ (- 1) = open-interval@(- z, - t)

para.p:
We denote
×
C n
R
with this operation by
H n
. This is a Lie group of dimension
+
⁢ 2 n
1
, called the Heisenberg group.

Writing
= z
+ x
⁢ i y
define

Math.text: formulae@(X _ j = partial-differential / partial-differential@(x _ j) - (1 / 2) * y _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)), 1 less= j less= n)

para.p: and

Math.text: formulae@(Y _ j = partial-differential / partial-differential@(y _ j) + (1 / 2) * x _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)), 1 less= j less= n)

para.p: and

Math.text: T = partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)

para.p:
We calculate the Lie brackets of these vector fields. For
X j
and
X k
,

Math.text: X _ j * X _ k = (partial-differential / partial-differential@(x _ j) - (1 / 2) * y _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t))) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(x _ k) - (1 / 2) * y _ k * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)))
X _ j * X _ k

absent = (partial-differential / partial-differential@(x _ j) - (1 / 2) * y _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t))) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(x _ k) - (1 / 2) * y _ k * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)))

Math.tex: \displaystyle=\frac{\partial^{2}}{\partial x_{j}\partial x_{k}}-\frac{1}{2}y_{% k}\frac{\partial}{\partial x_{j}}\frac{\partial}{\partial t}-\frac{1}{2}y_{j}% \frac{\partial}{\partial t}\frac{\partial}{\partial x_{k}}+\frac{1}{4}y_{j}y_{% k}\frac{\partial^{2}}{\partial t^{2}},
Math.text: absent = (partial-differential ^ 2 / (partial-differential@(x _ j) * partial-differential@(x _ k)) - (1 / 2) * y _ k * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(x _ j)) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)) - (1 / 2) * y _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(x _ k))) + (1 / 4) * y _ j * y _ k * (partial-differential ^ 2 / partial-differential@(t ^ 2))

Math.tex: \displaystyle=\frac{\partial^{2}}{\partial x_{j}\partial x_{k}}-\frac{1}{2}y_{% k}\frac{\partial}{\partial x_{j}}\frac{\partial}{\partial t}-\frac{1}{2}y_{j}% \frac{\partial}{\partial t}\frac{\partial}{\partial x_{k}}+\frac{1}{4}y_{j}y_{% k}\frac{\partial^{2}}{\partial t^{2}},
Math.text: absent = (partial-differential ^ 2 / (partial-differential@(x _ j) * partial-differential@(x _ k)) - (1 / 2) * y _ k * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(x _ j)) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)) - (1 / 2) * y _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(x _ k))) + (1 / 4) * y _ j * y _ k * (partial-differential ^ 2 / partial-differential@(t ^ 2))

para.p: yielding

Math.text: closed-interval@(X _ j, X _ k) = X _ j * X _ k - X _ k * X _ j = 0

para.p:
For
Y j
and
Y k
,

Math.text: Y _ j * Y _ k = (partial-differential / partial-differential@(y _ j) + (1 / 2) * x _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t))) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(y _ k) + (1 / 2) * x _ k * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)))
Y _ j * Y _ k

absent = (partial-differential / partial-differential@(y _ j) + (1 / 2) * x _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t))) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(y _ k) + (1 / 2) * x _ k * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)))

Math.tex: \displaystyle=\frac{\partial^{2}}{\partial y_{j}\partial y_{k}}+\frac{1}{2}x_{% k}\frac{\partial}{\partial y_{j}}\frac{\partial}{\partial t}+\frac{1}{2}x_{j}% \frac{\partial}{\partial t}\frac{\partial}{\partial y_{k}}+\frac{1}{4}x_{j}x_{% k}\frac{\partial^{2}}{\partial t^{2}},
Math.text: absent = partial-differential ^ 2 / (partial-differential@(y _ j) * partial-differential@(y _ k)) + (1 / 2) * x _ k * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(y _ j)) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)) + (1 / 2) * x _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(y _ k)) + (1 / 4) * x _ j * x _ k * (partial-differential ^ 2 / partial-differential@(t ^ 2))

Math.tex: \displaystyle=\frac{\partial^{2}}{\partial y_{j}\partial y_{k}}+\frac{1}{2}x_{% k}\frac{\partial}{\partial y_{j}}\frac{\partial}{\partial t}+\frac{1}{2}x_{j}% \frac{\partial}{\partial t}\frac{\partial}{\partial y_{k}}+\frac{1}{4}x_{j}x_{% k}\frac{\partial^{2}}{\partial t^{2}},
Math.text: absent = partial-differential ^ 2 / (partial-differential@(y _ j) * partial-differential@(y _ k)) + (1 / 2) * x _ k * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(y _ j)) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)) + (1 / 2) * x _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(y _ k)) + (1 / 4) * x _ j * x _ k * (partial-differential ^ 2 / partial-differential@(t ^ 2))

para.p: yielding

Math.text: closed-interval@(Y _ j, Y _ k) = Y _ j * Y _ k - Y _ k * Y _ j = 0

para.p:
For
X j
and
Y j
,

Math.text: X _ j * Y _ j = (partial-differential / partial-differential@(x _ j) - (1 / 2) * y _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t))) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(y _ j) + (1 / 2) * x _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)))
X _ j * Y _ j

absent = (partial-differential / partial-differential@(x _ j) - (1 / 2) * y _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t))) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(y _ j) + (1 / 2) * x _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)))

absent = (partial-differential ^ 2 / (partial-differential@(x _ j) * partial-differential@(y _ j)) + (1 / 2) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)) + (1 / 2) * x _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(x _ j)) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t))) - (1 / 2) * y _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(y _ j)) - (1 / 4) * y _ j * x _ j * (partial-differential ^ 2 / partial-differential@(t ^ 2))

absent = (partial-differential ^ 2 / (partial-differential@(x _ j) * partial-differential@(y _ j)) + (1 / 2) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)) + (1 / 2) * x _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(x _ j)) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t))) - (1 / 2) * y _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(y _ j)) - (1 / 4) * y _ j * x _ j * (partial-differential ^ 2 / partial-differential@(t ^ 2))

para.p: and

Math.text: Y _ j * X _ j = (partial-differential / partial-differential@(y _ j) + (1 / 2) * x _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t))) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(x _ j) - (1 / 2) * y _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)))
Y _ j * X _ j

absent = (partial-differential / partial-differential@(y _ j) + (1 / 2) * x _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t))) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(x _ j) - (1 / 2) * y _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)))

absent = ((partial-differential ^ 2 / (partial-differential@(y _ j) * partial-differential@(x _ j)) - (1 / 2) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)) - (1 / 2) * y _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(y _ j)) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t))) + (1 / 2) * x _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(x _ j))) - (1 / 4) * x _ j * y _ j * (partial-differential ^ 2 / partial-differential@(t ^ 2))

absent = ((partial-differential ^ 2 / (partial-differential@(y _ j) * partial-differential@(x _ j)) - (1 / 2) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)) - (1 / 2) * y _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(y _ j)) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t))) + (1 / 2) * x _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(x _ j))) - (1 / 4) * x _ j * y _ j * (partial-differential ^ 2 / partial-differential@(t ^ 2))

para.p: yielding

Math.text: closed-interval@(X _ j, Y _ j) = X _ j * Y _ j - Y _ j * X _ j = partial-differential / partial-differential@(t) = T

para.p:
For
X j
and
Y k
with
≠ j k
,

Math.text: X _ j * Y _ k = (partial-differential / partial-differential@(x _ j) - (1 / 2) * y _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t))) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(y _ k) + (1 / 2) * x _ k * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)))
X _ j * Y _ k

absent = (partial-differential / partial-differential@(x _ j) - (1 / 2) * y _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t))) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(y _ k) + (1 / 2) * x _ k * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)))

Math.tex: \displaystyle=\frac{\partial^{2}}{\partial x_{j}\partial y_{k}}+\frac{1}{2}x_{% k}\frac{\partial}{\partial x_{j}}\frac{\partial}{\partial t}-\frac{1}{2}y_{j}% \frac{\partial}{\partial t}\frac{\partial}{\partial y_{k}}-\frac{1}{4}y_{j}x_{% k}\frac{\partial^{2}}{\partial t^{2}}
Math.text: absent = (partial-differential ^ 2 / (partial-differential@(x _ j) * partial-differential@(y _ k)) + (1 / 2) * x _ k * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(x _ j)) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t))) - (1 / 2) * y _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(y _ k)) - (1 / 4) * y _ j * x _ k * (partial-differential ^ 2 / partial-differential@(t ^ 2))

Math.tex: \displaystyle=\frac{\partial^{2}}{\partial x_{j}\partial y_{k}}+\frac{1}{2}x_{% k}\frac{\partial}{\partial x_{j}}\frac{\partial}{\partial t}-\frac{1}{2}y_{j}% \frac{\partial}{\partial t}\frac{\partial}{\partial y_{k}}-\frac{1}{4}y_{j}x_{% k}\frac{\partial^{2}}{\partial t^{2}}
Math.text: absent = (partial-differential ^ 2 / (partial-differential@(x _ j) * partial-differential@(y _ k)) + (1 / 2) * x _ k * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(x _ j)) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t))) - (1 / 2) * y _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(y _ k)) - (1 / 4) * y _ j * x _ k * (partial-differential ^ 2 / partial-differential@(t ^ 2))

para.p: and

Math.text: Y _ k * X _ j = (partial-differential / partial-differential@(y _ k) + (1 / 2) * x _ k * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t))) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(x _ j) - (1 / 2) * y _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)))
Y _ k * X _ j

absent = (partial-differential / partial-differential@(y _ k) + (1 / 2) * x _ k * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t))) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(x _ j) - (1 / 2) * y _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)))

Math.tex: \displaystyle=\frac{\partial^{2}}{\partial y_{k}\partial x_{j}}-\frac{1}{2}y_{% j}\frac{\partial}{\partial y_{k}}\frac{\partial}{\partial t}+\frac{1}{2}x_{k}% \frac{\partial}{\partial t}\frac{\partial}{\partial x_{j}}-\frac{1}{4}x_{k}y_{% j}\frac{\partial^{2}}{\partial t^{2}},
Math.text: absent = ((partial-differential ^ 2 / (partial-differential@(y _ k) * partial-differential@(x _ j)) - (1 / 2) * y _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(y _ k)) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t))) + (1 / 2) * x _ k * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(x _ j))) - (1 / 4) * x _ k * y _ j * (partial-differential ^ 2 / partial-differential@(t ^ 2))

Math.tex: \displaystyle=\frac{\partial^{2}}{\partial y_{k}\partial x_{j}}-\frac{1}{2}y_{% j}\frac{\partial}{\partial y_{k}}\frac{\partial}{\partial t}+\frac{1}{2}x_{k}% \frac{\partial}{\partial t}\frac{\partial}{\partial x_{j}}-\frac{1}{4}x_{k}y_{% j}\frac{\partial^{2}}{\partial t^{2}},
Math.text: absent = ((partial-differential ^ 2 / (partial-differential@(y _ k) * partial-differential@(x _ j)) - (1 / 2) * y _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(y _ k)) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t))) + (1 / 2) * x _ k * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(x _ j))) - (1 / 4) * x _ k * y _ j * (partial-differential ^ 2 / partial-differential@(t ^ 2))

para.p: yielding

Math.text: closed-interval@(X _ j, Y _ k) = 0

para.p:
For
X j
and
T
,

Math.tex: X_{j}T=\left(\frac{\partial}{\partial x_{j}}-\frac{1}{2}y_{j}\frac{\partial}{% \partial t}\right)\frac{\partial}{\partial t}=\frac{\partial}{\partial x_{j}}% \frac{\partial}{\partial t}-\frac{1}{2}y_{j}\frac{\partial^{2}}{\partial t^{2}% }=TX_{j},
Math.text: X _ j * T = (partial-differential / partial-differential@(x _ j) - (1 / 2) * y _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t))) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)) = (partial-differential / partial-differential@(x _ j)) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)) - (1 / 2) * y _ j * (partial-differential ^ 2 / partial-differential@(t ^ 2)) = T * X _ j

para.p: yielding

Math.text: closed-interval@(X _ j, T) = 0

para.p:
For
Y j
and
T
,

Math.tex: Y_{j}T=\left(\frac{\partial}{\partial y_{j}}+\frac{1}{2}x_{j}\frac{\partial}{% \partial t}\right)\frac{\partial}{\partial t}=\frac{\partial}{\partial y_{j}}% \frac{\partial}{\partial t}+\frac{1}{2}x_{j}\frac{\partial^{2}}{\partial t^{2}% }=TY_{j},
Math.text: Y _ j * T = (partial-differential / partial-differential@(y _ j) + (1 / 2) * x _ j * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t))) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)) = (partial-differential / partial-differential@(y _ j)) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(t)) + (1 / 2) * x _ j * (partial-differential ^ 2 / partial-differential@(t ^ 2)) = T * Y _ j

para.p: yielding

Math.text: closed-interval@(Y _ j, T) = 0

para.p: We summarize the above calculations in the following theorem.

The Lie brackets of the vector fields
X j
,
Y j
,
1 ≤ j ≤ n
, and
T
are:

Math.text: closed-interval@(X _ j, X _ k) = 0
closed-interval@(Y _ j, Y _ k) = 0
closed-interval@(X _ j, Y _ j) = T

para.p:
=
[
X j
,
Y k
]
0
for
≠ j k

Math.text: closed-interval@(X _ j, T) = 0
closed-interval@(Y _ j, T) = 0

para.p:
The Lie algebra of the
H n
is called the Heisenberg Lie algebra and is denoted
h n
. The above vector fields are left-invariant and are a basis for
h n
. 1 footnote 1 1 footnote 1 Sundaram Thangavelu, An Introduction to the Uncertainty Principle: Hardy’s Theorem on Lie Groups, p. 47, §2.1.

For a Hilbert space
H
, we denote by
⁢ B
( H )
the set of bounded linear operators
→ H H
, which is a Banach algebra with the operator norm. We denote by
⁢
B 0
( H )
the set of compact operators
→ H H
, which is a closed ideal of the Banach algebra
⁢ B
( H )
. We denote by
⁢
B HS
( H )
the collection of Hilbert-Schmidt operators
→ H H
: if
{
e i
:
∈ i I
}
is an orthonormal basis of
H
, a linear map
: A
→ H H
is called a Hilbert-Schmidt operator if

Math.text: ((norm@(A)) _ HS) ^ 2 = (sum _ (i element-of I))@((norm@(A * e _ i)) ^ 2) less infinity

para.p:
This satisfies
≤
∥ A ∥
∥ A ∥
HS
. A Hilbert-Schmidt operator is a compact operator. A linear map
: U
→ H H
is called a unitary operator if it is a bijection and satisfies

Math.text: formulae@(list@(U * x, U * y) = list@(x * y, x), y element-of H)

para.p:
We denote the set of unitary operators
→ H H
by
⁢ U
( H )
.

For
∈ λ R
,
≠ λ 0
, for
∈
(
+ x
⁢ i y
, t )
H n
, and for
∈ f
⁢
L 2
(
R n
)
, define

Math.text: formulae@(pi _ lambda * open-interval@(x + i * y, t) * f * xi = e ^ (i * lambda * t) * e ^ (i * lambda * (x cdot xi + ((1 / 2) * x) cdot y)) * f * (xi + y), xi element-of R ^ n)

para.p:
It is apparent that
⁢
π λ
( z , t )
is a linear map
→
⁢
L 2
(
R n
)
⁢
L 2
(
R n
)
.

For
∈
(
+ x
⁢ i y
, t )
,
(
+ u
⁢ i v
, s )
H n
we calculate

Math.text: pi _ lambda * open-interval@(x + i * y, t) * pi _ lambda * open-interval@(u + i * v, s) * f * xi = pi _ lambda * open-interval@(x + i * y, t) * e ^ (i * lambda * s) * e ^ (i * lambda * (u cdot xi + ((1 / 2) * u) cdot v)) * f * (xi + v)
pi _ lambda * open-interval@(x + i * y, t) * pi _ lambda * open-interval@(u + i * v, s) * f * xi
absent = pi _ lambda * open-interval@(x + i * y, t) * e ^ (i * lambda * s) * e ^ (i * lambda * (u cdot xi + ((1 / 2) * u) cdot v)) * f * (xi + v)
absent = e ^ (i * lambda * t) * e ^ (i * lambda * (x cdot xi + ((1 / 2) * x) cdot y)) * e ^ (i * lambda * s) * e ^ (i * lambda * (u cdot (xi + y) + ((1 / 2) * u) cdot v)) * f * (xi + y + v)
absent = e ^ (i * lambda * t) * e ^ (i * lambda * (x cdot xi + ((1 / 2) * x) cdot y)) * e ^ (i * lambda * s) * e ^ (i * lambda * (u cdot (xi + y) + ((1 / 2) * u) cdot v)) * f * (xi + y + v)
absent = e ^ (i * lambda * (t + s)) * e ^ (i * lambda * ((x + u) cdot xi + ((1 / 2) * x) cdot y + u cdot y + ((1 / 2) * u) cdot v)) * f * (xi + y + v)
absent = e ^ (i * lambda * (t + s)) * e ^ (i * lambda * ((x + u) cdot xi + ((1 / 2) * x) cdot y + u cdot y + ((1 / 2) * u) cdot v)) * f * (xi + y + v)

para.p:
On the other hand, with
= z
+ x
⁢ i y
and
= w
+ u
⁢ i v
,

Math.text: open-interval@(z, t) * open-interval@(w, s) = open-interval@(z + w, t + s + (1 / 2) * Im * (z cdot overline@(w)))
open-interval@(z, t) * open-interval@(w, s)
absent = open-interval@(z + w, t + s + (1 / 2) * Im * (z cdot overline@(w)))
absent = open-interval@(x + i * y + u + i * v, t + s + (1 / 2) * Im * ((x + i * y) cdot (u - i * v)))
absent = open-interval@(x + i * y + u + i * v, t + s + (1 / 2) * Im * ((x + i * y) cdot (u - i * v)))
absent = open-interval@(x + u + i * (y + v), t + s + (1 / 2) * Im * ((x cdot u - (i * x) cdot v) + (i * y) cdot u + y cdot v))
absent = open-interval@(x + u + i * (y + v), t + s + (1 / 2) * Im * ((x cdot u - (i * x) cdot v) + (i * y) cdot u + y cdot v))
absent = open-interval@(x + u + i * (y + v), ((t + s) - ((1 / 2) * x) cdot v) + ((1 / 2) * y) cdot u)
absent = open-interval@(x + u + i * (y + v), ((t + s) - ((1 / 2) * x) cdot v) + ((1 / 2) * y) cdot u)

para.p: for which

Math.text: pi _ lambda * open-interval@(z, t) * open-interval@(w, s) * f * xi = e ^ (i * lambda * (((t + s) - ((1 / 2) * x) cdot v) + ((1 / 2) * y) cdot u)) * e ^ (i * lambda * ((x + u) cdot xi + ((1 / 2) * (x + u)) cdot (y + v))) * f * (xi + y + v)
pi _ lambda * open-interval@(z, t) * open-interval@(w, s) * f * xi
absent = e ^ (i * lambda * (((t + s) - ((1 / 2) * x) cdot v) + ((1 / 2) * y) cdot u)) * e ^ (i * lambda * ((x + u) cdot xi + ((1 / 2) * (x + u)) cdot (y + v))) * f * (xi + y + v)
absent = e ^ (i * lambda * (t + s)) * e ^ (i * lambda * ((x + u) cdot xi + ((1 / 2) * x) cdot y + y cdot u + ((1 / 2) * u) cdot v)) * f * (xi + y + v)
absent = e ^ (i * lambda * (t + s)) * e ^ (i * lambda * ((x + u) cdot xi + ((1 / 2) * x) cdot y + y cdot u + ((1 / 2) * u) cdot v)) * f * (xi + y + v)

para.p: and therefore

Math.text: pi _ lambda * open-interval@(x + i * y, t) * pi _ lambda * open-interval@(u + i * v, s) = pi _ lambda * open-interval@(z, t) * open-interval@(w, s)

para.p: We calculate

Math.text: pi _ lambda * open-interval@(0, 0) * f * xi = f * xi

para.p: and

Math.text: pi _ lambda * open-interval@(x + i * y, t) * pi _ lambda * (open-interval@(x + i * y, t)) ^ (- 1) * f = pi _ lambda * open-interval@(0, 0) * f = f

para.p:
For
∈
f , g
⁢
L 2
(
R n
)
,

Math.tex: \begin{split}&\displaystyle\left\langle\pi_{\lambda}(x+iy,t)f,\pi_{\lambda}(x+% iy,t)g\right\rangle\\ &\displaystyle\int_{\mathbb{R}^{n}}\pi_{\lambda}(x+iy,t)f(\xi)\overline{\pi_{% \lambda}(x+iy,t)g(\xi)}d\xi\\ \displaystyle=&\displaystyle\int_{\mathbb{R}^{n}}e^{i\lambda t}e^{i\lambda% \left(x\cdot\xi+\frac{1}{2}x\cdot y\right)}f(\xi+y)e^{-i\lambda t}e^{-i\lambda% \left(x\cdot\xi+\frac{1}{2}x\cdot y\right)}\overline{g(\xi+y)}d\xi\\ \displaystyle=&\displaystyle\int_{\mathbb{R}^{n}}f(\xi+y)\overline{g(\xi+y)}d% \xi\\ \displaystyle=&\displaystyle\left\langle f,g\right\rangle.\end{split}
Math.text: list@(pi _ lambda * open-interval@(x + i * y, t) * f, pi _ lambda * open-interval@(x + i * y, t) * g) * (integral _ (R ^ n))@(pi _ lambda * open-interval@(x + i * y, t) * f * xi * overline@(pi _ lambda * open-interval@(x + i * y, t) * g * xi) * differential-d@(xi)) = (integral _ (R ^ n))@(e ^ (i * lambda * t) * e ^ (i * lambda * (x cdot xi + ((1 / 2) * x) cdot y)) * f * (xi + y) * e ^ (- i * lambda * t) * e ^ (- i * lambda * (x cdot xi + ((1 / 2) * x) cdot y)) * overline@(g * (xi + y)) * differential-d@(xi)) = (integral _ (R ^ n))@(f * (xi + y) * overline@(g * (xi + y)) * differential-d@(xi)) = list@(f, g)

Math.text: pi _ 1 * f * g = (integral _ (H ^ n / Gamma))@((integral _ (H ^ n / Gamma))@(f * (open-interval@(z, t) cdot (open-interval@(w, s)) ^ (- 1)) * g * open-interval@(w, s) * differential-d@(w) * differential-d@(s)) * pi _ 1 * open-interval@(z, t) * differential-d@(z) * differential-d@(t)) = (integral _ (H ^ n / Gamma))@(g * open-interval@(w, s) * (integral _ (H ^ n / Gamma))@(f * (open-interval@(z, t) cdot (open-interval@(w, s)) ^ (- 1)) * pi _ 1 * (open-interval@(z, t) cdot (open-interval@(w, s)) ^ (- 1)) * differential-d@(z) * differential-d@(t)) * pi _ 1 * open-interval@(w, s) * differential-d@(w) * differential-d@(s)) = (integral _ (H ^ n / Gamma))@(g * open-interval@(w, s) * pi _ 1 * f * differential-d@(w) * differential-d@(s)) = pi _ 1 * f * pi _ 1 * g

para.p: We define

Math.text: W * z = pi _ 1 * open-interval@(z, 0)

para.p: with which

Math.text: pi _ 1 * open-interval@(z, t) = e ^ (i * t) * W * z

para.p: Define

Math.text: f _ 1 * z = (2 * pi) ^ (- 1 / 2) * ((integral _ 0) ^ (2 * pi))@(f * open-interval@(z, t) * e ^ (i * t) * differential-d@(t))

para.p: Then

Math.text: pi _ 1 * f = (integral _ (H ^ n / Gamma))@(f * open-interval@(z, t) * e ^ (i * t) * W * z * differential-d@(z) * differential-d@(t))
pi _ 1 * f
absent = (integral _ (H ^ n / Gamma))@(f * open-interval@(z, t) * e ^ (i * t) * W * z * differential-d@(z) * differential-d@(t))
absent = (integral _ (C ^ n))@(W * z * ((integral _ 0) ^ (2 * pi))@(f * open-interval@(z, t) * e ^ (i * t) * differential-d@(t)) * differential-d@(z))
absent = (integral _ (C ^ n))@(W * z * ((integral _ 0) ^ (2 * pi))@(f * open-interval@(z, t) * e ^ (i * t) * differential-d@(t)) * differential-d@(z))
absent = (2 * pi) ^ (1 / 2) * (integral _ (C ^ n))@(f _ 1 * z * W * z * differential-d@(z))
absent = (2 * pi) ^ (1 / 2) * (integral _ (C ^ n))@(f _ 1 * z * W * z * differential-d@(z))

⁢

para.p: and

Math.text: H * Phi _ alpha = (2 * absolute-value@(alpha) + n) * Phi _ alpha

Math.text: (widehat@(h)) _ k = (- i) ^ k * h _ k

para.p: whence

Math.text: (widehat@(Phi)) _ alpha = (- i) ^ (absolute-value@(alpha)) * Phi _ alpha

Using the
1
-dimensional Mehler’s formula we obtain the
n
-dimensional Mehler’s formula:

Math.text: (sum _ alpha)@(r ^ (absolute-value@(alpha)) * Phi _ alpha * x * Phi _ alpha * y) = pi ^ (- n / 2) * (1 - r ^ 2) ^ (- n / 2) * exponential@((- (1 / 2) * ((1 + r ^ 2) / (1 - r ^ 2)) * ((absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2 + (absolute-value@(y)) ^ 2)) + (((2 * r) / (1 - r ^ 2)) * x) cdot y)

We now define the special Hermite functions on

α , β

Math.text: Phi _ (alpha * beta) * z = V * open-interval@(Phi _ alpha, Phi _ beta) * z

para.p: We calculate

Math.text: list@(W * z * Phi _ alpha, Phi _ beta) = (integral _ (R ^ n))@(W * z * Phi _ alpha * xi * Phi _ beta * xi * differential-d@(xi))
list@(W * z * Phi _ alpha, Phi _ beta)
absent = (integral _ (R ^ n))@(W * z * Phi _ alpha * xi * Phi _ beta * xi * differential-d@(xi))
absent = (integral _ (R ^ n))@(e ^ (i * (x cdot xi + ((1 / 2) * x) cdot y)) * Phi _ alpha * (xi + y) * Phi _ beta * xi * differential-d@(xi))
absent = (integral _ (R ^ n))@(e ^ (i * (x cdot xi + ((1 / 2) * x) cdot y)) * Phi _ alpha * (xi + y) * Phi _ beta * xi * differential-d@(xi))
absent = (integral _ (R ^ n))@(e ^ ((i * x) cdot xi) * Phi _ alpha * (xi + (1 / 2) * y) * Phi _ beta * (xi - (1 / 2) * y) * differential-d@(xi))
absent = (integral _ (R ^ n))@(e ^ ((i * x) cdot xi) * Phi _ alpha * (xi + (1 / 2) * y) * Phi _ beta * (xi - (1 / 2) * y) * differential-d@(xi))
absent = (2 * pi) ^ (n / 2) * V * open-interval@(Phi _ alpha, Phi _ beta)
absent = (2 * pi) ^ (n / 2) * V * open-interval@(Phi _ alpha, Phi _ beta)
